author: Staff Reporter
text:
He demands release of pension amount, attempts self-immolation

A differently abled person staged a dharna in front of the post office on IAF Road in East Tambaram here on Thursday demanding the release of his pension amount.

The protester, Nagaraj (45) of Adhi Nagar in East Tambaram, said he was receiving the pension of Rs. 1,000, as announced by the State government, and this month he was asked to go to the taluk office to verify the credit of the amount.

“Despite producing the details of the credited amount from the Tambaram taluk office, I was informed that the amount was yet to reach the post office account,” he said.

“Citing his physical condition, Mr. Nagaraj had asked for payment since the amount had already been sent by the taluk office. It is said that the post office staff refused to effect the payment and Nagaraj was asked to come on Monday. Irked by the reply, Nagaraj sat on IAF Road and after sometime, and attempted self-immolation in front of the post office. However, Selaiyur policemen prevented him from doing so. Later, he was paid the amount,” police sources said.
title: Differently abled person stages dharna at post office
